content.p: The Senate will appoint members to the Senate Disciplinary Committee to deal with allegations of disciplinary misconduct referred to it by the University Assessor. A Senate Disciplinary Committee shall be drawn together from the following pool of potential attendees:: In the case of matters brought under paragraph 8.4(8) of the Code of Discipline for Students one of the members of the panel should if possible be a trained dignity adviser. All members in the pool shall receive proper briefing prior to participation in a committee. The quorum in all cases will be three with due consideration given to ensuring diversity of membership and a decision to uphold a case against a student may be made by a majority of the Committee. The Registrar will appoint a member of their staff to act as Secretary to the Committee. approved by Senate 09/03/2021 Return to Committees list Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 115 951 5761 fax: +44 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
